title: The Civil War Lover's Guide to New York City
description: Few Americans associate New York City with the Civil War, but the most populated metropolitan area in the nation, then and now, is filled with scores of monuments, historical sites, and resources directly related to those four turbulent years. Veteran author Bill Morgans The Civil War Lovers Guide to New York City examines more than 150 of these largely overlooked and often forgotten historical gems.
author: Bill Morgan
